00064      G4double GetCalorSizeYZ()          {return CalorSizeYZ;};
00065       
00066      G4int GetNbOfLayers()              {return NbOfLayers;}; 
00067      
00068      G4Material* GetAbsorberMaterial()  {return AbsorberMaterial;};
00069      G4double    GetAbsorberThickness() {return AbsorberThickness;};      
00070      
00071      G4Material* GetGapMaterial()       {return GapMaterial;};
00072      G4double    GetGapThickness()      {return GapThickness;};
00073      
00074      const G4VPhysicalVolume* GetphysiWorld() {return physiWorld;};           
00075      const G4VPhysicalVolume* GetAbsorber()   {return physiAbsorber;};
00076      const G4VPhysicalVolume* GetGap()        {return physiGap;};

00094      G4double           WorldSizeX;
00095

00111

00127 
00128 //....oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo........oooOO0OOooo....
00129 
00130 inline void SQDetectorConstruction::ComputeCalorParameters()
00131 {
00132   // Compute derived parameters of the calorimeter
00133      LayerThickness = AbsorberThickness + GapThickness;
00134      CalorThickness = NbOfLayers*LayerThickness;
00135      
00136      WorldSizeX = 1.2*CalorThickness; WorldSizeYZ = 1.2*CalorSizeYZ;
00137 }
